queryset.query:
SELECT ATFUNC_B_GETTREELVL(BEL.BELONG_ID) LVL ,BEL.BELONG_ID ,BEL.BELONG_NM ,BEL.UP_BELONG_ID FROM AT_BELONG BEL WHERE 1=1
AND BEL.UP_BELONG_ID = #{belongId}
AND BEL.UP_BELONG_ID IS NULL
AND ATFUNC_B_GETNM(BEL.BELONG_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{belongNm},'%')
AND ATFUNC_B_CANUSE(BEL.BELONG_ID) = 'Y' ORDER BY BEL.SORT_CHAR ASC
